fields.name: AvailabilityState
fields.description: Management information availability state for the app.

fields.name: ClientAffinityEnabled
fields.description: true to enable client affinity; false to stop sending session affinity cookies, which route client requests in the same session to the same instance. Default is true.

fields.name: ClientCertEnabled
fields.description: true to enable client certificate authentication (TLS mutual authentication); otherwise, false. Default is false.

fields.name: ClientCertExclusionPaths
fields.description: client certificate authentication comma-separated exclusion paths

fields.name: ClientCertMode
fields.description:
This composes with ClientCertEnabled setting.
- ClientCertEnabled: false means ClientCert is ignored.
- ClientCertEnabled: true and ClientCertMode: Required means ClientCert is required.
- ClientCertEnabled: true and ClientCertMode: Optional means ClientCert is optional or accepted.

fields.name: CloningInfo
fields.description: If specified during app creation, the app is cloned from a source app.

fields.name: ContainerSize
fields.description: Size of the function container.

fields.name: CustomDomainVerificationId
fields.description: Unique identifier that verifies the custom domains assigned to the app. Customer will add this id to a txt record for verification.

fields.name: DailyMemoryTimeQuota
fields.description: Maximum allowed daily memory-time quota (applicable on dynamic apps only).

fields.name: DefaultHostName
fields.description: Default hostname of the app. Read-only.

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: true if the app is enabled; otherwise, false. Setting this value to false disables the app (takes the app offline).

fields.name: EnabledHostNames
fields.description:
Enabled hostnames for the app.Hostnames need to be assigned (see HostNames) AND enabled. Otherwise,
the app is not served on those hostnames.

fields.name: HTTPSOnly
fields.description:
HttpsOnly: configures a web site to accept only https requests. Issues redirect for
http requests

fields.name: HostNameSslStates
fields.description: Hostname SSL states are used to manage the SSL bindings for app's hostnames.

fields.name: HostNames
fields.description: Hostnames associated with the app.

fields.name: HostNamesDisabled
fields.description: true to disable the public hostnames of the app; otherwise, false. If true, the app is only accessible via API management process.

fields.name: HostingEnvironmentProfile
fields.description: App Service Environment to use for the app.

fields.name: HyperV
fields.description: Hyper-V sandbox.

fields.name: InProgressOperationId
fields.description: Specifies an operation id if this site has a pending operation.

fields.name: IsDefaultContainer
fields.description: true if the app is a default container; otherwise, false.

fields.name: IsXenon
fields.description: Obsolete: Hyper-V sandbox.

fields.name: KeyVaultReferenceIdentity
fields.description: Identity to use for Key Vault Reference authentication.

fields.name: LastModifiedTimeUtc
fields.description: Last time the app was modified, in UTC. Read-only.

fields.name: ManagedEnvironmentId
fields.description: Azure Resource Manager ID of the customer's selected Managed Environment on which to host this app. This must be of the form /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroup}/providers/Microsoft.App/managedEnvironments/{managedEnvironmentName}

fields.name: MaxNumberOfWorkers
fields.description:
Maximum number of workers.
This only applies to Functions container.

fields.name: OutboundIPAddresses
fields.description: List of IP addresses that the app uses for outbound connections (e.g. database access). Includes VIPs from tenants that site can be hosted with current settings. Read-only.

fields.name: PossibleOutboundIPAddresses
fields.description: List of IP addresses that the app uses for outbound connections (e.g. database access). Includes VIPs from all tenants except dataComponent. Read-only.

fields.name: PublicNetworkAccess
fields.description: Property to allow or block all public traffic. Allowed Values: 'Enabled', 'Disabled' or an empty string.

fields.name: RedundancyMode
fields.description: Site redundancy mode

fields.name: RepositorySiteName
fields.description: Name of the repository site.

fields.name: Reserved
fields.description: true if reserved; otherwise, false.

fields.name: ResourceGroup
fields.description: Name of the resource group the app belongs to. Read-only.

fields.name: ScmSiteAlsoStopped
fields.description: true to stop SCM (KUDU) site when the app is stopped; otherwise, false. The default is false.

fields.name: ServerFarmId
fields.description: Resource ID of the associated App Service plan, formatted as: "/subscriptions/{subscriptionID}/resourceGroups/{groupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/serverfarms/{appServicePlanName}".

fields.name: SiteConfig
fields.description: Configuration of the app.

fields.name: SlotSwapStatus
fields.description: Status of the last deployment slot swap operation.

fields.name: State
fields.description: Current state of the app.

fields.name: StorageAccountRequired
fields.description: Checks if Customer provided storage account is required

fields.name: SuspendedTill
fields.description: App suspended till in case memory-time quota is exceeded.

fields.name: TargetSwapSlot
fields.description: Specifies which deployment slot this app will swap into. Read-only.

fields.name: TrafficManagerHostNames
fields.description: Azure Traffic Manager hostnames associated with the app. Read-only.

fields.name: UsageState
fields.description: State indicating whether the app has exceeded its quota usage. Read-only.

fields.name: VirtualNetworkSubnetId
fields.description:
Azure Resource Manager ID of the Virtual network and subnet to be joined by Regional VNET Integration.
This must be of the form /subscriptions/{subscriptionName}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/{vnetName}/subnets/{subnetName}

fields.name: VnetContentShareEnabled
fields.description: To enable accessing content over virtual network

fields.name: VnetImagePullEnabled
fields.description: To enable pulling image over Virtual Network

fields.name: VnetRouteAllEnabled
fields.description: Virtual Network Route All enabled. This causes all outbound traffic to have Virtual Network Security Groups and User Defined Routes applied.
